document.full_text: a high-profile group of global leaders declared the "war on drugs" a failure on thursday and urged governments to consider decriminalizing drugs in a bid to cut consumption and weaken the power of organized crime gangs.
document.title: global war on drugs a failure, high-level panel says
lines_and_colors: a high-profile group of global leaders declared the "war on drugs" a failure on thursday and urged governments to consider decriminalizing drugs in a bid to cut consumption and weaken the power of organized crime gangs.
